review.title: “A Learning Experience”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunity to learn among like-minded young professionals; they provide a decent salary; opportunity to work in cross-functional teams; company is financially successful.
review.cons: Cons – Some groups in the company are cut-throat and brutal; managers are known to work you hard; very competitive environment.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Your employees are your best asset: treat them with care or risk losing a lot.
